about_the_game:
BECOME WHAT YOU HAVE IMAGINED

In Rock Simulator 2, you’re more than just a collector. You’re an observer of time and nature. Unlock over 100 different rocks, each representing a piece of the world around us. Every rock has a purpose. Some are milestones of your progress. Others are puzzles waiting to be solved.

LEVELING

Growth is not a race. Like erosion sculpting stone over centuries, true progress rewards consistency and patience. Unlock and upgrade your rocks, and with each step forward, learn to appreciate the slow and methodical pace.

MULTIPLAYER

Experience peaceful environments with friends. There’s no pressure here. Sit together in silence or chat while watching the sun dip below the horizon. Sometimes, just existing with others is enough.

WEATHER

There is beauty in shared silence. Join friends in serene environments, watching the sun sink below the horizon. No need for words. Simply being present together is enough—a quiet acknowledgment of existence and connection.

AMBIENCE

Let the soundscapes guide you. Listen to rain, wind, or gentle music as you immerse yourself in the present. There’s no need to rush—this is your time.

LEADERBOARD

Success is not only measured by speed but by endurance. How long can you simply be? The leaderboard honors those who understand that existing fully in each moment is an achievement of its own.

PUZZLES

There’s something hidden in the rocks. Be curious. Pay attention. The answers reveal themselves to those who truly look.

Rock Simulator 2 isn’t about winning or losing. It’s about slowing down, connecting, and finding meaning in the small things. Every moment, every rock, is part of a larger journey.

name: Rock Simulator 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Rock Simulator 2 is a multiplayer, meditative idle game for relaxation and discovery. Start in the Hideaway, a peaceful retreat where you collect and appreciate nature’s creations. Unwind with friends, shape your environment, and enjoy the quiet beauty of the world around you.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
